sentence.Network_en: a sentence with a determinate meaning
The growth of spruce and fir needles is determinate.
sentence.Network_cn: 云杉和冷杉的针叶生长是有限的.

sentence.Network_en: Thus, enough equations are generated to make the problem determinate.
sentence.Network_cn: 于是, 产生了足够的方程使问题为定解.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语词汇的奥秘 ... lineate 有线，划线的 determinate 确定的 roseate 玫瑰似的.
数学专业英语词汇... ... determinantal equation 行列式方程 determinate 一定的 determinate automaton 确定性自动机.

list.abs: 行字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 行列〖 line;row〗 行列式〖 determinant〗 行情〖 quotationsonthemarket;prices〗.
高一英语单词表 - 豆丁网 ... bring sb back 送回某人 determine vi 决定；决心 live adv 现场地；直播地.
定_百度百科 ... （8） 决定[ decide] （10） 确定[ determine] （12） 规定[ stipulate].
决字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 决无〖 upon〗 决心〖 determination;resolution〗 决一雌雄〖 fightitout〗.
妇产科医学名词-词汇翻译 ... 雌激素撤退试验 estrogen withdral test 测定 determination 测量 measurment.
决定论（determinism）是所有学科研究的出发点。进行任何科学研究之前都必须首先假设，宇宙事物之间有一定的规律或法则可循。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Latin determinatus 'limited, determined', past participle of determinare (see determine)

example.ex: ...a contract for the exclusive possession of land for some determinate period.
example.tran: 规定了某段限定时期内土地专有权的合同

means.word_mean: 1. precisely determined or limited or defined; especially fixed by rule or by a specific and constant cause;
2. not continuing to grow indefinitely at the apex;
3. supplying or being a final or conclusive settlement;

auth_sentence.content: The clear and determinate meaning of my words.
auth_sentence.res_content: The clear and determinate meaning of my words.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The clear and determinate meaning of my words.

auth_sentence.content: Having a determinate but unmeasurable value means that path-forward causality must hold.
auth_sentence.res_content: Having a determinate but unmeasurable value means that path-forward causality must hold.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Having a determinate but unmeasurable value means that path-forward causality must hold.

auth_sentence.content: Being part of the universe we ourselves are determinate, therefore no free will.
auth_sentence.res_content: Being part of the universe we ourselves are determinate, therefore no free will.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Being part of the universe we ourselves are determinate, therefore no free will.

stems_affixes.word_buile: determine[v.决心,决定;确定,限定]+ate……的→adj.确定的
determine[v.决心,决定;确定,限定]+ed……的→adj.下定了决心的
in无+termin界限;末端+able可以……的→没有界限的→无穷无尽的
determinate[adj.确定的]+ive表名词→n.决定之事, 限定词
termin界限;末端+al表名词→n.终点[站];终端
terminate[v.[使]结束,[使]停止]+ion表名词→n.终止,结束
termin界限;末端+ology学科→定出界限的学科→下定义→术语学
termin界限;末端+us→界限之点→终点
de加强+termin界限;末端+e→加强界限→确定
ex出+termin界限;末端+ate表动词→从界限中赶出来→根除
termin界限;末端+ate表动词→定出界限→终结
